citations.narrative:
Electrical cords for the heater and the water pump are on the floor inside the sloth enclosure. The animal may chew
on the electric cords resulting in injury or death . All electric cords must inaccessible to the animals to prevent injury.
CORRECT BY : 1/28/18
The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the store manager.
